headline: Wall Street Analysts Think Datadog (DDOG) Is a Good Investment: Is It?
summary: Based on the average brokerage recommendation (ABR), Datadog (DDOG) should be added to one's portfolio. Wall Street analysts' overly optimistic recommendations cast doubt on the effectiveness of this highly sought-after metric. So, is the stock worth buying?

headline: Datadog, Inc. (DDOG) is Attracting Investor Attention: Here is What You Should Know
summary: Datadog (DDOG) has received quite a bit of attention from Zacks.com users lately. Therefore, it is wise to be aware of the facts that can impact the stock's prospects.
